name: Tug of War (ShinyDev)
description:
This is a simple kind of autoclicker type game where you find people to help tug stuff. It's a simple 2d UI game.

GameJam

This is a gamejam game made for the brakeys gameJam in february 2021. 
I really did not have much time to work on the game, I guess I did it in about 10 hours.

And it was my first time in a gamejam :)
